backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing and validating contact form entries, allowing submission and retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining color variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes and wraps them in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/BookFreeConsulta: CTA component offering WhatsApp, call, and contact form actions in compact or full card variants.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, success/error handling, and backend submission via React Query.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: React footer component showing company info, navigation links, services, and contact details with a fallback logo.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, mobile menu, and consultation contact actions.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the site header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Static dataset defining multiple solar project entries with metadata and benefits.
frontend/src/data/serviceDetails.ts: Structured service descriptions including SEO fields, features, benefits, and target audiences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook for submitting contact form data to the backend and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes plus base typography utilities.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides functions to set document title and meta tags for SEO and social sharing.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculator.ts: Implements solar calculation logic including assumptions, subsidy rules, system sizing, savings estimation, and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company overview, vision, mission, leadership info, and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: Renders an interactive solar savings calculator using utility functions and updates SEO on load.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, office locations, a contact form, and sets page SEO.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content, services, testimonials, and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Renders a detailed explanation of how a grid-connected solar system works, including steps, diagrams, and benefits. Sets SEO metadata and displays a consultation CTA.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Displays a portfolio of solar projects with stats, a gallery, and SEO setup. Uses project data to render cards with images, capacity, and locations.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific solar service using dynamic routing, including overview, features, benefits, and SEO metadata. Handles missing services with a fallback screen.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all available solar services in a grid with icons, descriptions, and links to detail pages. Sets SEO data and includes a consultation CTA section.
frontend/src/pages/SubsidiesPage.tsx: Explains available government solar subsidies with cards, tables, and SEO setup. Includes subsidy amounts and a consultation CTA.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s current website plan, required features, image needs, and architectural notes for building the GKV Smart Energy Services site. Lists existing features including subsidy upgrades, a working diagram section, services refactor, and a solar calculator.
